product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Edge 4 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: If storm clouds move in on your backpacking trip, rest assured. The lightweight, freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Edge 4 Dome Tent shelters you and 3 friends (or 2 friends and a dog). 7000-series aluminum poles are strong and lightweight; pole clips provide quick setup. Made with a breathable, tough polyester taffeta canopy and coated polyester taffeta rainfly and floor with factory-sealed seams for waterproofness. 2 large vestibules are ideal for stashing gear. Vestibules also serve as guyout points that stabilize the tent when the weather gets nasty. Rainfly buckles to the tent for a secure, adjustable attachment. Mesh ceiling vents allow airflow and stargazing. Includes stakes, guylines and stuff sacks. Special buy.
short_description: If storm clouds move in on your backpacking trip, rest assured. The lightweight, freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Edge 4 Dome Tent shelters you and 3 friends (or 2 friends and a dog).
